artist: Designer: Possibly by Christopher Dresser; Manufacturer: Hukin & Heath
creditline: Gift of funds from the friends of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of his 60th birthday
description: flower-form bowl; three-dimensional stem with leaves, buds and flowers twines around bottom to form foot

below number stamp on leaf, incised: illegible inscription
